pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

lessons.japanese: 既知のことは未知のことと区別しなくてはならない。
lessons.english: The known must be separated from the unknown.

lessons.japanese: Ｘ記号は数学ではたいてい未知数を表す。
lessons.english: The symbol "x" usually stands for an unknown quantity in mathematics.

lessons.japanese: 未知の語に出会った時には、辞書で調べなければならない。
lessons.english: When you come across new words, you must look them up in your dictionary.

lessons.japanese: 彼は未知の国々の事実を収集しながら世界中を旅行する。
lessons.english: He travels about the world gathering facts about little known countries.

lessons.japanese: 既知のことは未知のことと区別しなくてはならない。
lessons.english: The known must be separated from the unknown.

lessons.english: The symbol "x" usually stands for an unknown quantity in mathematics.

lessons.japanese: 彼は未知の国々の事実を収集しながら世界中を旅行する。
lessons.english: He travels about the world gathering facts about little known countries.

lessons.english: When you come across new words, you must look them up in your dictionary.
